basics.name: Sarah Johnson
basics.label: Senior Full-Stack Developer & Technical Lead
basics.summary: Experienced full-stack developer with 8+ years in building scalable web applications and leading technical teams. Specialized in React, Node.js, and cloud architecture. Passionate about mentoring junior developers and driving technical excellence through best practices and innovative solutions.

work.name: TechCorp Inc.
work.summary: Lead development of core platform features serving 2M+ users. Architect scalable solutions using React, Node.js, and AWS infrastructure.
highlights: Led migration from monolith to microservices, reducing deployment time by 75%
Mentored 5 junior developers, with 3 receiving promotions within 18 months
Implemented CI/CD pipeline reducing bug reports by 60%
Designed and built real-time chat system handling 50K+ concurrent connections

work.name: TechCorp Inc.
work.summary: Lead development of core platform features serving 2M+ users. Architect scalable solutions using React, Node.js, and AWS infrastructure.
highlights: Led migration from monolith to microservices, reducing deployment time by 75%
Mentored 5 junior developers, with 3 receiving promotions within 18 months
Implemented CI/CD pipeline reducing bug reports by 60%
Designed and built real-time chat system handling 50K+ concurrent connections

work.name: StartupXYZ
work.summary: Built MVP and scaled to 100K users. Worked across the entire stack from database design to frontend UX.
highlights: Developed core product features that drove 200% user growth in first year
Optimized database queries reducing average response time from 800ms to 120ms
Implemented automated testing suite achieving 95% code coverage
Built mobile-responsive web app supporting iOS and Android users

work.name: Digital Agency Co.
work.summary: Delivered custom web solutions for clients ranging from startups to Fortune 500 companies.
highlights: Built 25+ responsive websites using React, Vue.js, and vanilla JavaScript
Improved client website performance by average of 40% through optimization techniques
Collaborated with design team to create pixel-perfect implementations
Managed projects from requirements gathering to deployment

work.name: FreelanceWeb Solutions
work.summary: Provided web development services to small businesses and startups.
highlights: Completed 15+ projects including e-commerce sites and business websites
Managed full project lifecycle from client consultation to maintenance
Built custom WordPress themes and plugins for specific client needs

volunteer.summary: Mentor aspiring developers from underrepresented backgrounds, providing technical guidance and career advice.
highlights: Mentored 20+ developers through career transitions into tech
Organized monthly coding workshops for beginners
Created open-source learning resources used by 1000+ developers

volunteer.summary: Redesigned and maintained the shelter's website to improve pet adoption rates.
highlights: Increased online adoption applications by 150%
Built donation system that raised $25K+ for shelter operations
Trained staff on website content management

courses: CS61A - Structure and Interpretation of Computer Programs

awards.title: Employee of the Year
awards.summary: Recognized for exceptional technical leadership and mentoring contributions that significantly impacted team productivity and culture.

awards.title: Best Technical Innovation
awards.summary: Awarded for designing and implementing the real-time notification system that became a core product differentiator.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Achieved Dean's List recognition for academic excellence in final semester.

publications.name: Building Scalable React Applications: A Comprehensive Guide
publications.summary: A detailed guide covering advanced React patterns, state management, and performance optimization techniques for enterprise applications.

publications.name: Microservices Migration: Lessons Learned
publications.summary: Practical insights and strategies for successfully migrating legacy monolithic applications to microservices architecture.

references.name: Michael Chen
references.reference: Sarah is an exceptional developer and technical leader. Her ability to architect scalable solutions while mentoring junior team members made her invaluable to our organization. She consistently delivered high-quality code and drove technical excellence across our team.

references.name: Emily Rodriguez
references.reference: Working with Sarah at StartupXYZ was inspiring. She has rare combination of technical depth and business acumen. Her contributions were instrumental in our successful product launch and subsequent growth to 100K users.

projects.name: DevTools Dashboard
projects.description: Open-source developer productivity dashboard that aggregates metrics from multiple development tools and platforms.
highlights: Built with React, Node.js, and GraphQL
Integrated with GitHub, Jira, and Slack APIs
Downloaded 10K+ times on npm
Featured in JavaScript Weekly newsletter

projects.name: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce solution with real-time inventory management, payment processing, and admin dashboard.
highlights: Handles 1000+ concurrent users
Integrated with Stripe and PayPal
Built responsive admin panel
Implemented advanced search and filtering

projects.name: Real-time Chat Application
projects.description: Scalable chat application supporting multiple rooms, file sharing, and video calls.
highlights: Built with Socket.io for real-time communication
Supports 50K+ concurrent connections
Integrated WebRTC for video calling
Mobile-responsive Progressive Web App
